title: Capitol Reef National Park: Other Special Uses
body: Other Special Uses       Permits are required for any group/organized activity that includes but is not limited to rendezvous & rallies, charity events, sporting, and training events (e.g. cycling/running). If you are unsure if your event/activity requires a permit, please contact us. Submit a Special Use Permit Application a minimum of three weeks in advance. Special Use Permit payment may be made through pay.gov. Do not submit payment until receiving authorization from the Park.
